Policy circular no. 91/2004, dated 18.11.2004 and policy circular no_ 91/2012 , dated 14.09.2012 were issued  detailing the procedure to be adopted for acceptance of Bank Guarantees alongwith the guidelines for physical verification of Bank Guarantees among others instructions. 2_ Now , on introduction of  methodology for   submission of BG linking through Structure Financial Message System (SFMS), as per the circular issued by Ministry of Finance, vide no. F.NO: 7/112/2011-BOA, dated 17.07.2012= henceforth, for smooth   operation and verification of genuineness of BG, a clause para shall be ensured for incorporation into the body of the BG/BG renewal letter as per following: The guarantorl bank hereby confirms that it is On the SFMS (Structural Finance   Messaging System) platform & shall invariably send an advice of this Bank Guarantee to the designated bank of NHAI after obtaining details thereof from NHAI. The above para will be added in the BG formats in all draft Contracts/ Agreements / RFQ/ RFP' s etc_ being issued and also in all demand notices issued henceforth for extension/renewal of BG's sought. 3 Further, for verification/confirmation of the Bank Guarantee submitted by linking through SFMS may be verified by any of the responsible officer at PIU/HQ personally from the designated Bank branch of NHAI-PIU/HQ against which the Bank Guarantee is linking through SFMS. Further, a copy of system generated confirmation through SFMS duly singed by the concerned Bank Manager may be obtained for record and future reference. 4 This issues with the approval of Chairman: (S P Sharma) General Manager (Coord:) All officers and employees of HQ/ROs / PIUs/ CMUs /Site Officers Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 51DM NAA get To,
